name: DeathScreenTweaks
description: Various tweaks to the "New Best" screen. (Formerly DisturbingNewBests.)

configdir.name: Click me to open the Config Directory!
configdir.desc:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your custom death screen splash texts), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

checkJustDont.name: Run "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." Check
checkJustDont.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

When Geometry Dash opens, automatically check if the "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." setting is enabled.

<cy>This setting is for the slim minority of users who don't have the "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." option enabled in GD's settings. This setting is disabled by default and the check only runs once per game session on the main menu.</c>

changeDeathText.name: Custom "New Best" Texts
changeDeathText.description: Leaving this enabled is semi-important, since it's kind of the original purpose of this mod. You can disable it though if you want, I guess.

custom.name: Include Custom Messages
custom.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Includes your own custom "New Best" text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory.

customTextsOnly.name: Only Use Custom Messages
customTextsOnly.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Only uses your own custom "New Best" texts from "custom.txt" file.

If no custom quotes are found, the mod will fall back to the default set of quotes.

<cr>Enabling this setting will override the "Include Brandon Rogers" setting if you have written your own custom quotes.</c>

brandonRogers.name: Include Brandon Rogers (READ!)
brandonRogers.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Includes quotes from YouTube comedian Brandon Rogers.
<cr>WARNING: Brandon Rogers' humor may not be for everyone, but the quotes have been allowed by Geode's lead developers.</c>

<cr>This is your only warning.</c>

hideNewBestMessages.name: Hide "New Best" Messages
hideNewBestMessages.description: Hide death messages on "New Best" screens.

lineWrapping.name: Linewrapping
lineWrapping.description:
Allows linewrapping for all "New Best" death messages.

Useful for anyone who wants incredibly long (but still legible) death messages.

Disabling this option will ignore whatever value you have set for the "'New Best' Text Max Scale" setting below.

maxScale.name: "New Best" Text Max Scale
maxScale.description:
Sets the max scale of all "New Best" death messages.

(The "Linewrapping" setting above needs to be enabled for this setting to apply.)

customFont.name: "New Best" Text Font #
customFont.description:
Sets the font of all "New Best" death messages. 0 for Pusab, -1 for Golden Pusab, -2 for chatFont.
-All other numbers: use the level editor, find the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, then put it here.</c>

customFontGoldColor.name: Gold Color (Non-Golden Pusab Fonts)
customFontGoldColor.description: Applies something close to the gold color for "New Best" death messages <cp>only if your setting for "'New Best' Text Font #" is not 0</c>.

accuratePercent.name: Accurate Death Percentage
accuratePercent.description: Adds decimal points to the score on your "New Best" screen.

accuracy.name: Accu. Death % Accuracy
accuracy.description: Choose how many decimal points to add for your percentage on your "New Best" screen.

newBestSFX.name: "New Best" SFX
newBestSFX.description:
<cl>Original idea by Tacocat.</c>

Play a unique SFX whenever you get a legitimate "New Best" screen during Normal Mode.Make sure there is an audio file named "</c><cl>newBest</c><cy>" in the config directory.</c>

.mp3, .wav, .ogg, .oga, and .flac are supported.

extension.name: "New Best" SFX File Extension
extension.description:
Choose the SFX file extension for your "New Best" SFX. Only applies to Normal Mode.
<cy>Only file extensions supported by the FMOD audio engine</c> <cy>(</c><cl>https://fmod.com</c><cy>, which Geometry Dash uses) are available for this setting.</c>

newBestVolume.name: "New Best" SFX Volume
newBestVolume.description: Set the volume of your "New Best" SFX (as a percentage).

alwaysNewBest.name: Always New Best [Normal Mode]
alwaysNewBest.description:
<cl>Original idea by Tacocat.</c>

Shows a "New Best" screen, even when you did not make a new best.

<cy>Percentages displayed from this setting use in-game/vanilla calculations</c> <cr>ONLY.</c>

<cr>If you see two "New Best" screens when dying in a level, you probably hacked that level.</c>

alwaysNewBestPractice.name: Always New Best [Practice Mode]
alwaysNewBestPractice.description: Always show a "New Best" when you die in <cg>practice mode</c>.

alwaysNewBestPlaytest.name: Always New Best [Testmode]
alwaysNewBestPlaytest.description:
Always show a "New Best" when you die in <cl>testmode</c> (playtesting levels).
<cl>You really shouldn't enable this. It just looks silly. But the option's here anyway, because why not.</c>

currencyLayer.name: Hide Reward Animations
currencyLayer.description: Hides the reward animation from "New Best" screens in rated levels.

noVisibleNewBest.name: Hide "New Best" Screen
noVisibleNewBest.description:
<cl>Original idea by VolcaroCham.</c>

Hides the "New Best" screen when getting a new best.

Not sure why anyone would willingly enable this, but now the option exists in this mod. Have fun.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
